div.h1: File:Flag of the Democratic Republic of the Congo.svg

img.alt: File:Flag of the Democratic Republic of the Congo.svg

div.p: Flag_of_the_Democratic_Republic_of_the_Congo.svg‎ (SVG file, nominally 800 × 600 pixels, file size: 798 B)

This is a file from the Wikimedia Commons. Information from its description page there is shown below.
Commons is a freely licensed media file repository. You can help.

a.title: This is a file from the Wikimedia Commons

img.alt: This is a file from the Wikimedia Commons

div.div: Français : Le drapeau de la République démocratique du Congo. Conformément à la Constitution de la République Démocratique du Congo de 2006, Article 1er: Son emblème est le drapeau bleu ciel, orné d’une étoile jaune dans le coin supérieur gauche et traversé en biais d’une bande rouge finement encadrée de jaune.

a.title: kg:Dalapo ya Repubilika ya Kongo Demokratiki

div.a: Dalapo ya Repubilika ya Kongo Demokratiki
Bɛndɛ́lɛ ya Republiki ya Kongó Demokratiki

a.title: sw:Bendera ya Jamhuri ya Kidemokrasia ya Kongo

div.a: Bendera ya Jamhuri ya Kidemokrasia ya Kongo

div.div: Česky: Státní vlajka Demokratické republiky Kongo.
Deutsch: Flagge der Demokratischen Republik Kongo. Erstellt laut den Angaben der Staatsverfassung von 2006.

English: The national flag of the Democratic Republic of the Congo. Created according to the 2006 constitution : Son emblème est le drapeau bleu ciel, orné d’une étoile jaune dans le coin supérieur gauche et traversé en biais d’une bande rouge finement encadrée de jaune. (Its symbol is a sky blue flag, decorated with a yellow star in the upper left corner and crossed in the diagonal by a red strip with thin yellow borders) It seems to be identical, except for a lighter field hue, to the 1966–1971 flag.
Esperanto: Flago de la Demokratia Respubliko Kongo. Kreita laŭ la ŝtata konstitucio de 2006.

a.title: it:Bandiera della Repubblica Democratica del Congo

div.a: Bandiera della Repubblica Democratica del Congo
Vlag van de Democratische Republiek Congo

div.div: Slovenščina: Državna zastava Demokratične republike Kongo
Walon: Drapea del Republike democratike do Congo

div.p: Click on a date/time to view the file as it appeared at that time.

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 09:18, 10 January 2009
Thumbnail for version as of 00:52, 22 November 2008
Thumbnail for version as of 10:02, 1 November 2008

td.span: (revert to Zscout370's code, blue colour Pantone 279 C from the UN flag)

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 21:28, 14 September 2008
Thumbnail for version as of 09:46, 1 July 2008

td.span: (Construction sheet from http://www.flickr.com/photos/halfcrazy/461958911/sizes/o/. The only thing needs to be checked is the red and gold bands. Not sure about the colors, though. )

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 05:07, 1 March 2006
Thumbnail for version as of 05:05, 1 March 2006

td.span: (Dimensions rounded off; construction corrected according to firsthand observation)

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 07:57, 20 February 2006
Thumbnail for version as of 21:05, 19 February 2006
Thumbnail for version as of 21:04, 19 February 2006
Thumbnail for version as of 17:14, 19 February 2006

td.span: (as seen at the ceremony where President Joseph Kabila promulgated the new constitution.)

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 01:25, 19 February 2006
Thumbnail for version as of 12:21, 18 February 2006

td.span: (old flag has been reestablished through the new constitution)

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 20:25, 5 February 2006

td.span: (colours from http://www.crwflags.com/fotw/flags/cd.html: Pantone 286C for blue and 109C for yellow)

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 08:10, 30 January 2006
Thumbnail for version as of 11:37, 24 November 2005
